experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline to transform raw data into inferred values with comprehensive automated unit and integration testing. Optimized system scalability through time complexity improvements, enhancing overall performance. Troubleshot and resolved model build pipeline failures in staging and production environments using CloudWatch logs. Streamlined and automated DevOps processes by restructuring CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions. Implemented data export/import functionality for timeseries data purge and restore, improving database efficiency and data lifecycle management.
reference_context: Experience section under National Renewable Energy Laboratory
experiences.reasoning: The listed tasks involve responsibilities typically associated with a software development engineer role, such as refining data processing, optimizing systems, troubleshooting, and improving CI/CD workflows.

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT and provided post-implementation support in production environments for 2 international financial banking firms. Engineered GUI based workflow runs for ETL pipelines and integrated them with backend scripts to process data. Enhanced UI for a module based on XML Forms Framework by customizing UI Forms and PL/SQL scripts. Generated PL/SQL scripts for data manipulation and validation to automate manual tasks, reducing execution times. Documented technical designs and deployed code packages across environments via WinSCP/PuTTY.
reference_context: Experience section under Oracle Financial Services Software
experiences.reasoning: The achievements listed pertain to a Software Development Engineer role, focusing on implementing solutions, engineering ETL workflows, and enhancing UI.

experiences.title: Embedded C++ Developer
experiences.description: Worked under Dr. Joby Antony, formerly a Visiting Scientist at CERN. Designed software modules for ARM Cortex-M3 embedded server sensor device to measure subzero temperatures. Troubleshot bugs and optimized the system to handle real-time sensor data via RPC transfer protocols.
reference_context: Experience section under Inter-university Accelerator Centre
experiences.reasoning: The tasks outlined are indicative of an embedded developer role, focusing on designing software for specific hardware and optimizing its performance.

experiences.title: Python Developer
experiences.description: Worked under the guidance of Ms. Vanita Agarwal. Successfully modeled discrete mathematical Rough Set Theory concepts for Sensor Data Mining using Python. Designed custom-built library to process 65,536 objects in 2 minutes with an accuracy of 95% using linear regression.
reference_context: Experience section under College of Engineering Pune
experiences.reasoning: The description indicates tasks typical of a developer role, involving modeling mathematical concepts and developing software libraries.
